name: Inovio Technologies
tagline: We focus on technology, you focus on idea
description:
We help with crucial product development activities to engineer products for startups, businesses & government organisations that are user centered & iterative to ensure success.
We are a custom software development company of more than 20 innovative people based in Dubai & Dhaka. Passion for building solutions that make disruptive impact drives our vision and operation. We love to pair up with passionate entre/intra-preneurs & lend them our design & cutting edge technology expertise.
We are experts in industries like Logistics, Team Management, Finance, Insurance, Banking, Media & Entertainment, Healthcare, Education & Digital Marketing.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Office number 26, Faraj Eissa Building, Hili Sanaiya
